programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1972
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep374
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company which all staffs are women. Unfortunately, he is clueless with women so he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love Mona.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school’s stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Let me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: A student called “I” finds the diary of his classmate, Sakura Yamauchi, and discovers that she has a pancreatic disease. The two begin to spend more time together, but Sakura eventually pass away from her illness. But Sakura had a hidden message she wanted to convey, will “I” uncover it 12 years after her death?

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman & coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the “sick people of Asia” and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Angel With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in the northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Because of his ignorance and silly behaviour, he was seen as a joke to the people. The warlord was finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason.

programme.title: Return Of The One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyara
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Tripura
programme.desc: Village girl who has weird dreams and all those dreams come true.She one day dreams that she will kill her Husband.

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Tuck Jagadish
programme.desc: In a village with greedy property fights among the families, Jagadish (Nani) carries on his father's legacy to reform all the property issues in his village while trying to reunite his family, which is also split due to property issues.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Biscoth
programme.desc: After the death of his father, Raja begins to work in his father's company. He, however, finds his life changed when he befriends Janaki who narrates stories that come true for him.

programme.title: Aan Devathai
programme.desc: Difficulties arise when Elango and Jessie, a married couple and parents of twins, decide to lead separate lives owing to an ugly fight.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Zombie Reddy
programme.desc: Mario, a game developer, and his friends, get caught up in the rivalry between two families and a mysterious zombie attack in Rayalaseema where they go to attend a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Prabhavati, an independent documentary filmmaker, with the help of her friends takes her mother-in-law, Gomatha, on a surprise trip to reunite her with her school friends.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Petta
programme.desc: In a bid to save his best friend's son Anwar, hostel warden Kaali goes against local goons. However, everything goes haywire when he is forced to face his past.

programme.title: OK Jaanu
programme.desc: Adi and Tara are ambitious people who fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. When he tries to molest her, she leaves him, and Rajiv tries to pursue another woman.

programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. When he tries to molest her, she leaves him, and Rajiv tries to pursue another woman.

programme.title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
programme.desc: Alizeh, an independent woman recovering from a breakup, and Ayan, a naive musician, meet in New York and form an incredible bond. From there, they experience love, heartbreak and the facts of life.

programme.title: Bajirao Mastani
programme.desc: The heroic Peshwa Bajirao, married to Kashibai, falls in love with Mastani, a warrior princess in distress. They struggle to make their love triumph amid opposition from his conservative family.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: Rani is devastated after her fiance leaves her just before the wedding. Undeterred, she decides to go on their honeymoon alone where she gets pulled out of her comfort zone and rediscovers herself.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Aatank Ki Jung
programme.desc: Meenakshi wants Zareen to help her take action against an ad agency owner, Gowtham. However, due to a turn of events, Meenakshi and Gowtham get intel on a terrorist attack and have to stop it.

programme.title: Kadamban
programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Janwar The Wild Man
programme.desc: Movie starring Karikalan, Priti Arora and Pandiyarajan and is directed by Karikalan.

programme.title: What The Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, is devoted to his stepmother as he only wishes to be showered with motherly love. However, his stepmother exploits his love to extort his wealth.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: Raj, the owner of a truck company, pursues Priya, a fashion designer, and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a separation that threatens to destroy their relationship.

programme.title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
programme.desc: Samir lies to his girlfriend, Sonia, that he is in an unhappy marriage. However, when he actually falls in love with her, she requests him to meet his estranged wife, putting him in a predicament.

programme.title: Yevadu
programme.desc: Satya gets a different face after he is almost killed, but a new face multiplies his problems. His ordeal begins when he leaves the hospital and has to deal with his lover's murderer.

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Parampara
programme.desc: Friends Pratap and Ranvir eventually discover that there is an old score to be settled between their families. Unfortunately, this can only be settled when they face each other in a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: World War II. An impossible mission ... The fate of the Allied invasion hanging in the balance. 12 men with nothing left to lose. Now the fate of the free world depends on a group of convicted murderers, thieves and thugs - The Dirth Dozen.

programme.title: The Green Berets
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this drama about a rugged Unites States Army Special Forces colonel and a cynical war correspondent who gain respect for each other in an epic-scaled story of the toughest fighting force on earth--and the even tougher men who lead them.

programme.title: Tequila Sunrise
programme.desc: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: He's the best there is, in fact, he's the only one there is! He's Ace Ventura Pet Detective, on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino.

programme.title: It's A Wonderful Life
programme.desc: On the Christmas Eve of Bedford Falls, the guardian angel Clarence is assigned to convince the desperate George Bailey not to commit suicide. George is a good man that sacrificed his dreams and his youth on behalf of the citizens of his small town.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

Plus, awesome commentary from our cast of comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Academy Award winner Cate Blanchett star in F. Scott Fitzgerald's story of the life and loves of a man experiencing his life backwards-- The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button. Director David Fincher brings this remarkable tale to the screen. Benjamin Button, is born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I and proceeds to grow younger as time passes. Button, who like any other man is unable to stop time, experiences life and his love for Daisy oddly out of synch with the rest of humanity in this time traveler's tale of the people and places Benjamin Button encounters, the loves he loses and finds, the joys of life and the sadness of death, and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit, Bliss, finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after joining a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: The President calls on his childhood best friends to save the planet from alien attacks that come in the form of video games.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 13
programme.desc: At a wilderness store, Michael reels in customers with an amazing new fishing tool, and at an AT&T store, Michael shows off a camera that's literally paper thin. Plus, a day of mini golf turns explosive when a loose cannon appears.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 14
programme.desc: Michael uncovers the secrets behind baoding balls, origami and paper lamps, and at Eataly, he reveals a spray that turns everything into bacon. Plus, a picture worth a thousand words leaves Michael's assistant speechless.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 15
programme.desc: Michael trains his coworkers how to hold a dog who can't hold it, and at the AT&T store, Michael shows off a new way to lighten the load. Plus, a man can vanish into a manhole, but the whole hole can't vanish, right?!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 16
programme.desc: At a cell phone store, Michael reveals an exciting new way to fix your tablet, and later, he makes a drink that's impossible to swallow. Plus, a dog owner loves that Michael has turned her pet into the smartest animal in the world.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 17
programme.desc: Michael turns leftovers into beauty products at a soap shop, and at a record store, he shows a hip-hop fan how to jump around. Plus, at a children's store, Michael's co-worker learns about the dangers of babysitting.

programme.title: Snow Animals
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin introduces a cast of charismatic animals to reveal the remarkable strategies they use to survive, and even thrive, through the winter.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong continues his journey around Iceland with a visit to a glacier, a trip to the island of Heimay which was nearly destroyed by a volcanic eruption in the 1970s, a walk on the most dangerous beach in the country and a night in a capsule hotel.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: New Zealand - Ben returns to New Zealand to catch up with the Long family, who live a hunter-gatherer existence on the country's South Island in an area that is two days hike from the nearest road. So how have the children coped with such an isolated upbringing, and how have the parents maintained their relationship?

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Michigan - Bass is big in America, so Robson is heading to Michigan for the coveted Bass Grand Slam. He's on one of the best bass fishing lakes in America, but is it enough to secure the prize?

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begin

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Anatomy Gone Wild Ep4
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins Ep1

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: Michele and Tobin's Summerhouse - Simon and his team are in Devon to help create a unique B&B that's not just for people. After achieving their dream of buying a small holding and stables, Michele and Tobin realised that the tired summerhouse on the property could offer lodgings.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Tokyo - Paul Hollywood begins his culinary and cultural road trip across Japan in Tokyo, where he experiences solo dining and karaoke, and goes on a karting tour dressed as a ninja turtle.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Rick braves the notoriously wild Atlantic waters to learn about the ancient fishing method of handlining at Sennen Cove off Land's End. The catch of the day is some deliciously plump pollock, which Rick uses to make the ultimate fish pie for the head gardener of Tresillian House, John Harris.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Melaka - In Melaka on Malaysia's South West Coast, Donal braves the Durian Puff! This snack is filled with the world's smelliest fruit which is hugely popular because once you bite into it, the sweet, creamy inside is very moreish.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where'S My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs/I Think We'Re Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep43
programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep44
programme.desc: Breaking Good - When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep44
programme.desc: He Got Game Night/73 - Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep71
programme.desc: One More Cup, Part 2 - King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep72
programme.desc: There Will Be Juice - When a crate of PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS washes onto shore King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep17

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert And The Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly… and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep49
programme.desc: Crocky'S Coconut - Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep50
programme.desc: Kings And Queens Of The Jungle - Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep102
programme.desc: Pip And The Wizard - Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal / Back To Ghoul - Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep77
programme.desc: The Zenith - With the whole universe in peril, Coran, Sam and Slav attempt to keep the fabric of space time from ripping. Voltron chases Honerva to stop her before all is lost.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Xtreme Xploits Of The Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it’s gone forever!

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas (Riding Free) Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren'T Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Rupert Saves Christmas - While riding his sleigh in the sky towards the North Pole on Christmas Eve, Crinkle the snow elf falls & lands in Nutwood. Worried about the fact Santa won't be able to deliver any presents without him Rupert & friends help Crinkle attract Santa's attention in the sky by building a huge magical daisy chain. It begins to fall apart as Crinkle climbs up high and so the gang decorate a magical Christmas tree that can be seen from the sky. As they hear santa's sleigh approaching crinkle climbs the tree & is reunites with Santa ensuring all presents are delivered on Christmas day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snow Key - Jack Frost has misplaced his Snow Key which unlocks the Spring. Without the key it will be snowy & Winter in Nutwood forever. Rupert & friends search Nutwood to help find the key unknowing Raggety has found the special key & is keeping it very safe. Will the gang find it in time & unlock Spring in time for the flowers & plants in Nutwood?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep51
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Hunting - Raa Raa has lost his toothbrush and sets off to find it. Where can it be?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep52
programme.desc: The Noisiest House In The Jungle - The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make… whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep104

programme.desc: 2500 Candles For Ra / It'S A Mad Mad Mad Underworld - 2500 Candles for Ra Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: All I want for Fishmas - With Fishmas around the corner, the season's hottest toy- Burpin' Bubbz - is at the top of Baby Shark's and William's wish lists. But when Santa Jaws goes missing, it's up to them to save Fishmas if they're ever going to get their fins on that toy.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble - Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fingertrap - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Truck Rangers - Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. But when Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble, Blaze must race to the rescue!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep114
programme.desc: A Pirate Christmas - Santiago and crew have to help Santa save Christmas.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Christmas is Coming! - On a quest to attend King Grouper's Christmas party and deliver a promised tree, Lady Oona and Lord Goby must face the ravages of winter and a mysterious Freezy Dragon, who seems intent on keeping them from the festivities.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Snow - It is snowing, so Peppa and George go outside to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Give-Away Day - Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep146
programme.desc: Funny Sounds - When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Father Christmas! / We promise, Papa - Barbapapa tells his children about his adventurous youth... and how during a trip on the ice floe, he met Father Christmas. // When he sees the barbababies wasting water, Barbapapa takes them aside to tell them a funny story.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble - Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day! // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets after a mix-up!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.desc: Wool - Pup is using a ball of wool to knit a hat for Kit, but he can't seem to knit the correct size.

programme.desc: Boat - Dee encourages a friend to say boat and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.desc: Rain - A cloud appears in Teletubbyland and it rains. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch the flowers bloom. Another cloud appears and it rains pink, Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: Top Hat - Tiny has carelessly flipped her cotton ball into the top hat. But when she looks for it, she ends up in a top hat world and is taken to places she never knew existed.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Ours - The Dinopaws build a treehouse but find they can't agree on how to decorate it.

programme.desc: Wish List - Monty talks about his friend Barnaby who seems to have every toy imaginable. This leads to him and Jimmy Jones to wonder what it would be like to have whatever you want.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.desc: I Slightly Want To Go Home - Lola is very excited about going to Lotta's house for a sleepover, but she soon realises everything is a bit different from her normal bedtime.

programme.desc: Rain Dance - Nelly and Nora discover the animals dance after every rain shower.

programme.desc: Dog Loves Amazing - While trying to solve a puzzle, Dog and Pug end up looking for a Minotaur in an ancient maze. After a number of false turns, they reach the centre and find the friendly Minotaur.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep7
